_sText:
mg _ mythology _ island_ beta
==================

objective:
------------------
there are 2 islands, one for cts, and one for the TTS, the goal is to pass the first island before the other team to take many mythological weapons, but beware before you reach the island mythological, you find with many traps, easter eggs, explosions and more
==================

in this beta version are the following features
==================
16 boats to reach the island mythological (8 per team)
==================
There are over 15 different weapons mythological to use!
==================
There are many traps, explosions, secrets, easter egg and sharks!
==================
Skybox 3D and beautiful ambient
==================
this beta version supports 32 players (maybe add more in the final version)
==================
This is a beta version, and i give you to test and comment, about it may encounter errors or improvements we can make to the map, for an excellent final version.
==================

[click here to watch the video of this map!, video by youku thanks!...](http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNTEzNTczNzA0.html "video by youku")

[mg_ mythology_ island_ beta video By francotirador](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z2EJ-W-McFg "Video of this map from Francotirador Thanks! click here!")

	 I DON'T WORK MORE IN THIS MAP, SO IF YOU CAN FINISH AND FIX ALL BUGS IN THE MAP I GIVE YOU THE VFM
